mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment ( content, writer_name, writer_id, created_date, board_id) VALUES (#{content}, #{writerName},#{writerId}, #{createdDate}, #{boardId});
mapper.select: SELECT comment.id, comment.content,comment.writer_id, comment.writer_name, comment.created_date, comment.board_id FROM comment INNER JOIN board on comment.board_id = board.id
SELECT comment.id, comment.content, comment.writer_id, comment.writer_name, comment.created_date, comment.board_id FROM comment WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment.content =#{content} WHERE comment.id=#{id}
